name: write_report
description: Writes a report with the given title and text content.

text.description: The text content of the report.

name: save_papers
description: Downloads papers from the provided URLs and saves them as PDF files.

papers.description: A list of dictionaries containing 'title' and 'url' keys.

name: return_first_n_pages
description: Opens PDF files and returns the text from the first n pages of each file.

files.description: A list of file paths to PDF files.

n.description: The number of pages to extract text from (default is 3).

name: search_arxiv
description: Performs a search on the arXiv API using the provided query.

max_results.description: The maximum number of results to retrieve (default is 10).

name: search_exa
description: Searches for papers on arXiv using the Exa API.

start.description: The start date for the search in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

end.description: The end date for the search in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

max_results.description: The maximum number of results to retrieve (default is 10).

name: clear_working_memory
description: Clears the files in the memory/working directory. If persist is True, moves the files to memory/episodic instead.

persist.description: Determines whether to move the files to memory/episodic or delete them (default is True).

name: create_context
description: Creates a context string containing paper abstracts.

papers.description: A list of dictionaries containing 'url' and 'abstract' keys.
